headline: Georgia primary pits Pence-endorsed Brian Kemp against Trump-backed David Perdue

Democrats Carolyn Bourdeaux and Lucy McBath were gerrymandered into the same Atlanta suburbs district during redistricting, and will be the first Democratic incumbent vs. incumbent matchup this cycle.
